item.title: Options (Finance)
item.description: An option is a contract that gives the holder the right to exercise the option (=buy/sell a stock) at the strike price at or before the strike date. It is a type of Derivative The person who gives out the option contract is the writer.

item.title: Order Statistic
item.description: Motivation. When you have iid random variables X1​,…,Xn​ with a known pdf, you sometimes want the pdf of the minimum, maximum or k-th smallest/biggest of the realizations.

item.title: Ordinal Allocation
item.description: Motivation. We move on from cardinal allocations where the Utility Function is numerically defined, into a situation where there is only an ordinal ranking by the agents.

item.title: Ordinary Least Squares Regression
item.description: Motivation. Let’s say that there is a relationship between GDP per capita and life expectancy. Maybe god has declared a perfect formula describing this relationship: GDP Per Capita=200⋅Life Expectancy+1000+Noise While we humans may never truly know the parameters of the formula, 200 and 1000, we can still make a good guess about it.

item.title: Overnight Index Swap
item.description: def. Overnight Index Swap (Is) is a type of Interest rate swaps that isn’t backed by any bond; two parties just decide to swap the two rates: floating leg: Basis Rate, the overnight rates fixed leg: both parties agree, ¶5% 5% of what? Both agree on a notional amount, which is a hypothetical principal amount.

item.title: Parallel Algorithms
item.description: Terminology Tp​(n): span; time taken for p-processes with input size n You may choose p=∞ i.e. T∞​(n) to analyze if unlimited parallelism was possible.

item.title: Pareto Efficiency
item.description: Pareto Efficiency is a state where you cannot make one person better off without making another person worse off. We will define pareto efficiency when there are n divisible items and n agents.

item.title: Percieved value—Real value
item.description: Perceived value—Real Value § (Use-value vs Exchange-value) Discrepancy decreases in the long run. People will notice that you brought value to their lives, but it may take time.
